name: 萨拉·索耶
introduction: Originally from Connecticut, Sarah Sawyer began her training in acting, dance, and voice at a young age. She is half Swedish. She grew up studying at the Stella Adler Studio of Acting in NYC. She has also trained at The American Academy of Dramatic Arts (NYC), the London Dramatic Academy, Berg Studios (LA), and Crash Acting (LA). She received her BA in Theatre Arts from Loyola Marymount University, where she also studied screenwriting. Many short films Sarah has starred in have gone on to screen at prestigious film festivals, including The Rhode Island International Film Festival, Palm Springs International Short Fest, Prague International Indie Film Festival, and OutFest. As a filmmaker, she has created short films, a web-series, and a music video.In 2021 she founded her own independent production company under Little Red Pictures.In 2022 she had a recurring VoiceOver role on MAX's "Tokyo Vice," and in 2024 she can be seen on-camera in season two.She currently resides in Los Angeles, California.
